content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photos of the sky because it looked pretty. the object appears in only one of the images.  it sort of resembles part of an aircraft but i can't distinguish wings.  light seems to be reflecting on the object in the same way the light is reflecting on the surrounding clouds.  

perhaps it is indeed an aircraft and we just can't see the wings because of the light angle.  it certainly is a mystery and i would like help in determining exactly what it is.  thanks.

i am submitting two images.  one is the object, and the other is for comparison.  please note i have four images in total, and only one of these images shows the object.
content.summary: The object appeared in one of four images taken of the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the regional trail at about 9:05 pm when i noticed orange light north east of me.It wasn't the first time i have seen the ''lights''.Ive seen them last year at around the same time august.The orange light were bright then they turned amber red and disappeared.3 lights were still visible and the fourth light shot straight up and disappeared.I was in shock i did not just see this ufo lights again!
content.summary: Orange lights

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1972, myself, and several of my family members briefly observed a large unidentified flying object. we were headed from our home in sikeston, missouri to our grandparents' house in campbell, missouri. we (7 family members)were headed south on highway 25 approaching malden, missouri when a very large disc-shaped object was briefly observed about 150 ft. from our car. the object was shooting downward toward the ground at approx. a 45 degree angle. it stopped only feet from the ground and quickly flipped upward at an opposite 45 degree angle. the object sped upward and away as quickly as it came. the object was extremely large. rectangular lights turned counter-clockwise, as if on a belt. each light was a new color. it happened so quickly, i'm not sure how many lights there were. my mom, dad, myself, a few of my siblings observed this. we had very little time to react during the event, but were excited after the sighting.
content.summary: Observed disc-like large object in road ahead. object's lights were rotating as it dove toward ground, tilted upward and flew off.

content.detailedDescription: Flying disc came up behind my car then hoovered 2 ft above car then ejected a red glowing ball ( basket ball size) then the glowing ball came to the rear window of my car and scanned me for about 20 seconds or so then went back up inside craft and disc then shot straight up out of sight.
content.summary: Flying disc that hoovered over my car

content.detailedDescription:
1 i was at my friends house at roof top watching sky
2 sister of my friend pointed the strange light moving in clock wise direction 4 dots like light with no focus from ground like a tourch does
3 i thought it was some children using many tourch at night for fun because it was independence day
4 circular light four of them moving in clock wise motion alternatively 2 of them were visible while other 2 were not bright and big and later became invisible and later started moving in straight parallel line 2 times like like ::::::::::::: but no trail were left  then again circular and again in line but in horizontal
 again circular and then vanished but my friend's sister told that it is visible but very it is very light (there was a bigger light in cloud behind those lights farther from that spot that i am sure was not any kite )
5 i thought it was just kids playing with many torch but it got like 10 minutes continuous circular motion  uniformly !! still no change in direction ,speed or path
then i thought it was due to the weather but lightning don't form so near to ground then i thought of jetstream s but they form up high in sky 
then i tried to take photo or video but my phone (moto e) cant take photo or video in so much dark i didn't have anything else at that time
i thought of throwing a rock at it to check if there is any solid thing in sky but it was not visible again 2 minutes i waited then i threw the rock at last seen position but the rock just went into sky(i am a javilin thrower) there is no chance that i could have missed that spot
6 it just vanished
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: First clock wise light with no focus from ground was observed almost after 15 minutes it got faint then it was not visible then seen 2 spots moving in straight line 2 times and more change of direction

content.detailedDescription:
Alrededor de las 11:40 del 30 de julio estando el suscripto junto a mi esposa e hija de ella en la terraza de la finca antes anunciada, aprovechando un hermoso día soleado, observamos en el cielo, en primera instancia la huella blanca de un avión a reacción. en esa circunstancia aparece de manera imprevista sobre la mencionada huella del avión un círculo rojo que por momentos se achicaba y se agrandaba y en otros momentos se alargaba en forma ovoidal y denotaba en ese momento un color plateado. por momentos desaparecía completamente y luego, cuando volvía aparecer se repetía lo descripto y así por un tiempo aproximado de media hora hasta que no se lo pudo visualizar más. cada vez que aparecía el objeto se había trasladado del lugar original.
agregamos que casualmente, mientras sucedía esto, pasaron dos aviones comerciales. el mencionado objeto no emitía sonido alguno y desconocemos si fue observado por otra persona.
se intentó sacar fotos con celular pero no se obtuvo ninguna imagen.
content.summary: Circulo rojo luminoso en ocasiones ovoidal plateado

content.detailedDescription: They started 5 years ago. i see them all the time meny different types.S and shapes
content.summary: They come every week or so

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were outside our house at around 10:30 pm on aug 14th 2014 when we observed a bright light in the sky moving entirely to fast to be an airplane the orb was moving in a straight line from west to east i did not believe at first this was a ufo until i seen the object streak across the sky at a unbelievable speeds then disappeared and also before we witnessed this object the sky was empty then as the object disappeared the sky filled with black helicopters and airplanes and they were all flying in formation which strikes me as odd.
content.summary: Bright orb in the sky observed, then shot off in a fast speed

content.detailedDescription:
I found this interesting and thought you would too: 
   i would like to report ufo sightings. for the past 3 
months i have noticed movements in the sky on clear nights. i borrowed a 4 and 1/2 inch reflecting 
telescope and noticed flying discs  about 3/4 inches in diameter.  they are perfectly round. they are divided into 3 sections.  they glow on the edges.  its hard to view because they are moving.  i have
viewed these discs about 4 times with the telescope.  every cloudless night they are there. sometimes
i see 5 movements up there in the sky.   if one had a better telescope it would be really be good.
content.summary: Read my e-mail

content.detailedDescription: I walked out my back door and my attention was attracted to this object flying from one cloud to another cloud very slowly.There was only two clouds in the entire sky at that time each being roughly 1/2 mile from each other with this enormous craft flying from the first cloud towards the second cloud.The craft i saw was the size of an aircraft carrier and made no noise at all and seemed to be taking its time moving from one cloud to the next as if to be wanting me to see it.It was internally lighted like a light bulb would appear inside of a lamp shade.It would move some distance then almost stop as if it was going to move backwards but then move forwards some more then almost stop again until it was just about to reach the second cloud then it cloaked (disappeared) completely but not into the cloud or behind the cloud it (cloaked).I felt like electricity was running though my whole body after viewing it and felt really strange.This was in broad daylight at 9:30 pm and i just cannot understand why 911 wasn't flooded with calls because this craft appeared to be wanting to be seen at least by me and did everything it could to get my attention.The craft glowed very bright yellowish white that stood out in the sky and where i live should have been seen by thousands of people at this time of day but i seem to be the only one that witnessed it.There is absolutely no doubt at all what i saw that morning on august 13 2014.It was what people call a mother ship and it was using the the two clouds in the sky that day for cover even though after seeing it cloak it could be parked right over your house on a clear day and you would never know it was even there.I had a digital camera inside my house but i knew if i went to grab it i would miss this event so i just watched it.I really don't care if anyone believes any of this information i have given you but i know it is all true and i now know without any doubt in my mind that they are here and they are here right now.
content.summary: Cigar craft of 1500ft moving from one cloud to another then craft cloaked and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting family.I went into the back garden for a smoke when i noticed a yellow glowing ball traveling across the sky.I shouted my family to come and observe.This was witnessed by four people.The glowing ball travelled across the front of ben nevis which is 1,344 metres high.It,s altitude was aprox two thirds up ben nevis.We observed this for approximateley 30 seconds when it shot upwards and disapeared.It was a clear night at the time with no cloud cover.
content.summary: Yellow glowing ball

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street and i saw a few thing that could be shooting stars so i decided to stare at the stars for a bit.I counted at least 7 possible ufos saw a fighter jet chase one or few away looked as if they were doing some thing strategic.Had to be to have jet scrambled in my opinion.But i was on river street in franklin opposite my house when i saw it.The fact i watched one turn from a blinking speck to a craft is amazing it was lit up a dim red and as it turned to craft there was a trumpet or odd sound that came from it.There was quite a bit of something going on in franklin last night and i feel i saw something serious go down.
content.summary: I saw multiple lights one turned from blinking sphere to futuristic craft

content.detailedDescription:
1.Me and my friend wher watching the sky and suddenly we saw this fast object that edmits light.
2.The speed that was high enough to make us watch it.
3.A meteorite/falling star.
4.No objeckt was seen just the light that it edmits the form was like a sphere and it was changing directions , the shape of the flight was like a triangle untill we lost it in the night sky
5.During the thing we wher thing waht we saw , and we wher most likley interested in it , efter it was in our minds for a long time.
6.We started talking abaut it and when we started looking for it but it was way far.
(i am not a grown up man but i know what i saw i am 14 year old , not making jokes whit you)
content.summary: We`ve seen a couple airplanes moving thrugh the sky but this thing that we witnesst was incredibly fast and it was fastly changing directions of flight

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were waiting for my brother to come load our trailers and noticed a light quickly move aacross the sky over towards another color changing light in the distance. we were about an hour north of grande prairie and the light was a few miles away to the west. it ascended and decended while changing directions back and forth like nothing we'dever seen. we watched it for about an hour and a half until we started loading then seen it again as we were leaving before it disappear eventually into the distance.
content.summary: It a constant colour changing light that changed directions amd altitudes often and quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my 14 year old son to a friends house for a sleep over, my son was in the back seat of my car. a friend of mine visiting me came for the ride to drop him off.  upon driving down the residential road to his location of drop off, my friend in the front seat said to me she just thought she saw a meteorite and she pointed to the sky area where she was seeing this.
my son was in the back seat looking out the window now seeing this also repeated that's weird it is just sitting there not moving. 

because i could not see it being the driver i decided to pull over my car on the street and i got out to view what they were talking about. but at that moment at first i did not see any thing, suddenly it appeared again and my son was saying do you see that.  i could not believe how weird it was.  i was viewing a glowing yellowish colored round shape in the black sky, it was pitch black outside. it just sat there in the same spot for about 2 minutes not moving, hovering i guess you called it, then in a flash it shot sideways to the right sat there for about 5 to 6  seconds and then shot straight up and disappeared again for a about 10 seconds, then we saw it again and it just sat there in the same spot, it dropped down like a flash then back up and disappeared.  i was stunned and trying to figure out if this was possible to be a jet plane but i have never seen a jet plane before move in these kind of directions and there was no plane lights just a  kind of yellow glow and round in shape.  when my friend first saw it from the front passenger seat she stated to me that it had a tail like a meteorite but the tail disappeared and she said the tail was a white yellowish color also.  i never saw the tail only the round object.

we are both adults in our 50's, we are not crazy and we know what we saw and it was a very strange experience.  it is now 3 am in the morning and i have not been able to sleep since this happened early.  i went on line to see if any one else reported any thing in our area and came across your site and decided to share this with you.  all i can say is i know this was not a plane and it was very strange. all i kept repeating was " what the heck is that"  my son too was freaked out.  on the way back to my house we kept looking to see if we could see it again but we did not. we could not stop talking about it after we got back home and i am sitting here still wondering what it was that we saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Spotted in sky a  yellowish glow like circular object

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:00 pm, shortly after i arrived at home and pulled into our driveway, i saw my wife carrying our 16 month old little boy walking out of our house to greet me. seconds later, before i could even fully get out of the car, i heard the baby say, "what is that"? as he pointed to the sky. i saw my wife look up where he was pointing, and her expression became very serious when she replied to our son, "i don't know what that is"!

she quickly turned to me and told me to come quickly and look. i thought she was probably seeing a meteorite or something, until i looked up to see a massive triangular craft hovering not that far from the top of the trees by our house. the object was very dark, with bright white lights, one situated on each of the three corners. it also had a large reddish light in the center, with at least two other white lights on one side. it appeared that these lights flashed intermittently, like a strobe light set at a low speed. 

what was most astounding to us was that the craft was completely silent. i was in disbelief that something that large and close would not make any sound. within a few seconds, the object started moving very slowly away from us towards the northeast, and eventually disappeared past the trees in the distance.

i attempted to make a video of the craft, and based on what i was seeing on my i-phone, it appeared that i was not able to capture anything. later, i downloaded the video to our computer, and was amazed to see that the flashing lights were visible! i will include the video with this report.

my wife and i are well educated, and do not use any illegal drugs or alcohol. what we saw was so incredible that we stayed up most of the night talking about it. it was not any kind of plane i know of. i even looked up videos of stealth bombers at night, and there is no comparison to what we saw. my wife is scared because it was such a bizarre thing to see. i felt so exhilarated by the experience that i am awake at 2:00 am submitting this report, and i have to wake up early tomorrow for work. i cannot explain what it is that we witnessed, but i will never forget it. i also plan to research this topic extensively from this point on!
content.summary: Extremely large, dark, triangular craft with three corner lights, a light in the center, and randomly located lights along one side.

content.detailedDescription: Looking up from my driveway to check cloud cover. watched a firey light approach from the n, almost directly over me it seemed. as it got closer it got much brighter and looked like a meteor at first but it seemed get brighter as it appeared to get closer. there was reddish orange glow about the color of fire that grew brighter and dimmer. i ran inside to get my camera and managed to get a couple good pictures, i think. we watched the object for several minutes as it seemed to make a wide, arcing turn towards the east. it seemed to come to a stop and hover a couple times. also looked to be changing altitude. it flew slowly off to the south then seemed to climb and accelerate away out of view, passing close to our local airport. the tower crew would have to have seen this object as well, if not made a radar hit on it. we continued to stare skyward trying to make sense of what we just saw. suddenly the object appeared again-or another object approached from high altitude to the south. same strange light effects as the first time, only this time coming towards us from the south. again the object passed right by the airport and made a turn in our direction. it seemed like it slowed to a stop, not directly above us but very close. i never imagined my still photos would capture this object with any clarity but when i enlarged them i was very surprised to see just how clear the images are. you guys aren't going to believe it. after a minute or two the object began moving away to the east but then made an obvious change in direction back to the south and again seemed to accelerate and climb towards the south until it disappeared. after a few more minutes, the object appeared in the same manner and followed a very similar flight path as the last pass. about 5 minutes after the object disappeared two fighter jets overflew us, passing very close to the spot where i first saw the object. i thought it odd that they just flew over and away to wnw. my guess is the jets were from pope, sent to respond to a report from the atc at the airfield but the pilots were just a few minutes too late. the object or planes had not been sighted again by the time i gave up watching for more. please send someone to see me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Saw object descend from above. observed multiple objects or the same object several times

content.detailedDescription: I was a little kid was just pick up by my mom an was going 2 my aunts house i was looking out the window because that's what i do when i first saw it i said hey is that halley comet an my mom pulled over i remember getting out of the car an sitting on the hood an then nothing ten years later i have a dream that was more of the memory i have of see the comet so i ask my mom an she can't remember more then seeing the comet she don't remember ever telling anyone about it so i don't know if this is something you can don't or find an fact i just can't stop thinking about it an want someone to tell me something
content.summary: A small sun

content.detailedDescription: I saw my first ufo few months back, i was grilling in the afternoon and looked up and spotted an airplane very high up, right on top of me, then another one going another direction but lower. then few minutes after i saw a black dot flying by, it was lower then the high airplane, i thought it was a small bird or even one of those particles inside your eye that you can sometimes see going across your eye, but it wasn't, i closed my eyes and rubbed them, i still saw the dot still flying by. as the dot was moving across the sky, it had an aura and the clouds behind it looked distorted as if it was water. the dot moved on a straight path, a little faster than about an airplane speed. i was just amazed that i was seeing an object flying that i could not identify. i had laser eye surgery few years back and my vision is 20/15, so i know my vision was not playing tricks on me. the dot was too small and high up that my camera would never capture it. it was very small dot. i lost view of the object as it went to the horizon.
content.summary: Small black dot flying across sky underneath clouds with distorted aura as it flew across.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While attending the contact in the desert event i left around 6:15pm on sunday night to get some dinner from the local sonic drive-thru. i ordered my food and paid the woman at the window, as she handed me my change i noticed this dark ball in the sky straight ahead of me. at this point it was 6:38pm. watching it for only a moment i inferred that it wasn't any kind of bird or aircraft that i'm familiar with, so i grabbed my cell phone and immediately started filming. i zoomed in to catch the object on film, and the girl at sonic opened her window to inform me they were just waiting on my sandwich to be done. i dropped the phone as she talked to me, but focused in on the flying object as soon as she left again. i watched this small spherical object fly just over the power lines, slowly, but consistently. i noticed a slight aura or field of sorts around the craft with my own eyes, and the object seemed to be rotating. when i was watching it i felt a great sense of calm, despite the unknown nature of its appearance. i followed this object with my cell phone just until that sonic girl handed me my food. after i left the drive thru window i tried finding the object again to record its path some more, and then i noticed it had greatly descended in altitude. when it dropped below where the power lines were, the color and of it became camouflaged against the valley's mountain line and i could no longer follow it.
content.summary: Smallish dark sphere that traveled too slowly to be other aircraft or animal

content.detailedDescription: Aug 14 around 11pm i was sitting in my hot tub watching the star sky when to the southwest i seen 3 bright lights flying towards the the west then i relized they were all one object cause the middle of the object was bloking out the stars in the sky it was the biggest thing of ever seen the it turned towards the south and dimmed out it was crazy im hooked will be sky watching the rest of my life.
content.summary: Sitting in hot tub seen a triangle shape object that was huge

content.detailedDescription:
I was surfing the internet and noticed, out of the corner of my eye, that my ir camera monitor was giving off more light than usual.  when i looked at it directly, i was looking at this object that didn't appear to be flying like a bug, bat, or bird, so i hit the "record" button on my remote.  i don't know how long it had been there...The video starts after i had observed something i hadn't seen before...Maybe about 2 minutes.  it's erratic flight is certainly odd.  toward the end of the video, there was an object that seemed to follow the path of the other object that flew from west to east.  when i pause my original vhs video, the object appears perfectly round...No wings, no appendages.  when looking at it in slow motion, it has some kind of an aura or halo effect around it, something that looks like turbulence.  toward the end of the video, there is a streak of light that passes from right to left that may be the object leaving at a high rate of speed.  also, at about 13 seconds into the video, there appeared to be another similar object that went across the screen from west to east.
this happened a couple days after i had observed something attached to my camera lens that i also videotaped.  at first i thought it was a spider web, but looking at the "creature" more closely on video, it appeared to have a spiral feature surrounded by thorny looking spikes.  except for the bright light at its' center, it was translucent...You can see a bat and numerous bugs flying around behind the "legs" and spiral part.  i thought that this "creature" was so unusual that i created an account on youtube and posted the videos.  i won't list them here per your above info.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed and videotaped orb on infrared camera

content.detailedDescription:
Early morning i am out on the beach with my friends i am clicking random pics of nature around me after clicking the pic i noticed a white glowing rod above the coconut tree
is visible in the pic
content.summary: Me and my friends were out on the beach early morning i clicked a pic of near by tree

content.detailedDescription: Round , black , hovered , caught in 3 photo's
content.summary: Snapping photo's of clouds

content.detailedDescription:
In mt cheaha state park, at the end of the rock garden pulpit rock trail, looking up the mountain slope at the restaurant, i was taking pics of the view, when i saw two fuzzy looking discs, flitting around in the sky over the restaurant. stunned, i watched them for about 30 seconds before snapping the pic. both objects streaked away to the north at incredible velocity, just after i snapped the pic. the objects made no noise, and seemed to be interacting with each other as well as searching for something in the area, by the pattern like way, that they flew. both objects were fuzzy looking. grey in color, but also seemed to glint sunlight off of their surfaces at certain angles. the objects interacted with one another by one following the other in a semi grid pattern. this pattern flight was at unbelievable speed, making right angle turns, stopping and starting almost faster then my eyes could keep up.   
  i was amazed and stunned to actually be witnessing such a thing. both of the objects shot away to the north from a hover, faster than i can describe, and were gone in an instant.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two fuzzy discs darted above the restaurant in different directions. hovered and darted off

content.detailedDescription: We were driving thru new mexico a few miles from the texas border. we were on our way home from a trip to show low, arizona where my brother lives. i have learned from shows on ufo sightings that ufos are sometimes hidden in clouds.  i took one photo of a storm cloud on 8/10/2014 around 6:00 pm. i did not see the object with a naked eye. a few days later, as i was looking over all the photos i took, i decided to magnify the storm cloud photo and noticed the neon green orb-like object. i magnified it as much as my camera would allow. i did not track any movement since i only took one photo and i was in a moving vehicle. in all honesty, i did not expect to find anything out of the ordinary in the cloud and was somewhat surprised when i did. i am not fearful of ufos, i am fascinated by the mystery and this is not the first time i've seen one. i have another pic of clouds in corpus christ that has at least two ufos hidden to the naked eye but visible as black objects when magnified. i am happy to submit that photo as well if it is requested. i also have many photos of orbs in different environments and events. as i said, i find this fascinating and am happy to share my experiences and photos.
content.summary: I took a picture of a storm cloud because i am aware ufo's can be seen in clouds. when i magnified the photo a few days later, i noticed the neon green glow in the darkest part of the cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
It was, i believe, the night after the full moon in may.  i had a small telescope and i was trying to get some good views of the moon.  i also had a night vision monocular, a pvs-14 with a 3x magnifier on a tripod with a video camera attached to it and a set of night vision goggles, pvs-7d (delta's) around my neck.  i usually have the goggles with me if it's a clear night out.  there were no clouds that night.  i was looking through the goggles and noticed a "plane" coming toward me from the north, heading south.  it was relatively low, 5000 feet or a little less. i'm pretty good at estimating distances, i'm a experienced skydiver and long distance shooter.  i thought it was a little weird that i wasn't hearing it coming towards me, doppler effect, so i started recording on the pvs-14.  i probably noticed it when it was maybe at a 75* angle.  as it was passing over me, i still heard nothing! no sound what so ever.  so i'm trying to look at it through the goggles and record it with the monocular at the same time.  as i'm watching it, i notice that as it's passing stars, i could see stars through the craft!!!!  i saw stars through the "fuselage" of the craft!!!  later, i confirmed this when i reviewed the video.  the craft was in the shape of a triangle.  there were two lights at the rear of the vehicle, circular, with a blinking light, also circular, almost between them, it was just a little above the two rear lights.  the light in front was shaped like a triangle itself, with a small, round light right behind it.  so all together, 5 lights.  i have, of course, seen planes through night vision goggles, helicopters, you can hear planes at 5000 feet, you can hear planes at 15,000 feet, 20,000 feet.  this thing was low and slow and silent!! even as it past over me and continued on.  i watched for a total of 8 minutes and 30 seconds.  when i first noticed it, again at about 75*, so if i saw it sooner, i might have seen it for 13-14 minutes?  the last weird thing that i noticed, was that when i took the goggles down for a second to get a barring as to where it was in the sky, i couldn't see any of the lights, not the fixed lights, not the single blinking light.  so either all the lights were very dim and the night vision enhanced them like they were made to do, or the lights were infrared, basically naked to the naked eye.  it flew out of sight, heading towards the south.  
so to recap: 
1: it was silent.
2: it was very slow moving.
3: the lights were either very dim or infrared.
4: i could see through it!!!  adaptive camouflage???  first time i've seen the real thing.
5: i couldn't see it without night vision goggles.
i will attach a "freeze frame" from the video.  if you would like to see the video, please let me know.
content.summary: Slow flying, low, silent, see-through triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing an account evening run about 20 miles south of waco, texas. at around 10:00 p.M. on june 28th, 2014 i looked up to the north eastern sky and saw what appeared to be three stars rotating clockwise in the sky in a triangle formation. it hovered very slowly parralel ih-35. i then saw it continue south following ih-35. it then travelled out of site at a very fast rate. the object appeared to be at least a mile long though it could have been bigger. when i saw it passing it eclipsed the stars above it so i knew it was a solid object. it also didnt make any noise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw what appeared to be 3 stars that rotated clockwise in a triangle shape then move south parralel ih35.

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed a bright pillar of vertical light 12 inches in diameter pass over our home moving from east to west. 10 minutes later the same pillar retraced its path over our home. observed large shape at approx 500-600 ft elevation moving silently west to east at approx 10 mph. object had 4 static lights on the underside.

reckoned this to some stealth military op as we live in san diego. however i do believe in extraterrestrial life and would consider this a qualified sighting. i would also personally discuss the sighting if that is of value.
content.summary: Large shape with in line lights moving slowly and silently west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to the doctors office i was looking at the moon cuz it was still out at 10:25am saw 3 objects 2 was flying one was hovering the it took off and the stopped again while the other 2 dipped off.
then a few miles down the road in honey creek corners i saw one of them just creeping along the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was driving to the doc's saw 3 crafts one was a plane i think cuz the jet stream saw one object 5 miles east after first sighting
